item.title: AspireCTF Web Challenge
item.description: IntroductionThis is a writeup on the Web Challenge of the Aspire CTF - 2021. AgentXChallenge Description Where are you from? Challenge site The paste contained the ips below 62.210.105.116 51.77.135.89 171.25.193.78 171.25.193.20 185.220.101.208 171.25.193.77 185.165.168.229 185.220.102.8 162.247.72.199 107.189.10.27 106.12.102.21 Following the access link, there is a PHP page that displays the IP address and errors out, Invalid Access! We can try to find out how developers access the IP address of a client.
